SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.proxy

Class ApplianceProxy

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.smarthome.model.proxy.ApplianceProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplianceInterface
public class ApplianceProxy extends Object implements ApplianceInterface
Proxy for Appliance. Intercepts the use() method to check for breakage immediately after use and triggers an urgent repair event if necessary (notifying Dad). All other methods are delegated directly to the underlying Appliance. Implements the Proxy pattern.

  • Constructor Summary

    ApplianceProxy(Appliance appliance)
    Constructs the proxy around a real appliance object.

  • Method Details

    • use

      public void use()
      Intercepts the usage action. 1. Delegates use() to the real appliance. 2. Delegates consumption update. 3. Checks if the appliance broke during use and notifies Dad for urgent repair.
      Specified by:
      use in interface ApplianceInterface
